activities: We provide employment selection and development assessments services to B2B customers. We collect name, email and in the case of employee selection services we collect ethnicity information for government monitoring and norming purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: individual job applicants and employees will provide their name, email address, and for government monitoring purposes their gender and ethnicity. this data is used internally and is aggrigated for research and norming purposes only. we do not mannually process data.
recoursemech:
BBB EU Safe Harbor
EU DPAs and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
